'''Deadly View''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Lighthouse Locutions]] on the island of [[Calamity Reef]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Kill a guard with a crewmate who is positioned on the lighthouse.</big>
